title: Top Places to visit in Aurangabad, Maharashtra
content: Aurangabad is a city in the Indian state of Maharashtra. It is the administrative headquarters of Aurangabad district and is the largest city in the Marathwada region. title: Top Places to visit in Akola, Maharashtra
content: Akola is a city in Vidarbha region in the state of Maharashtra in central India. title: Top Places to visit in Ahmednagar, Maharashtra
content: Ahmednagar is a city in Ahmednagar district in the state of Maharashtra, India, about 120 km northeast of Pune and 114 km from Aurangabad.
